name: Button
description: A UI element that represents a clickable button.

instanceFields.label: Text
instanceFields.description: The text displayed by the Button.

instanceFields.label: EnableRichText
instanceFields.description: When false, rich text tags will not be parsed.

instanceMethods.label: OnClick
instanceMethods.description: Sets the method to be called when the Button is clicked.

parameters.name: clickEvent
parameters.description: The method to call when the button is clicked.
